item.description: Traffic Collision; INC#0545; 09:24AM; 19741 W Crystal Hills Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/41e6Eqr; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Solo vehicle into two story home. No entrapment. No injury. L.A. Dept of Building & Safety en route. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1364).; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E28 E287 RA18 T87; CH8; Brian Humphrey

Trapped Vehicle; INC#1646; 09:32PM; 1406 W Carson St; MAP: https://bit.ly/412zhXt; Harbor Gateway; Traffic collision with a total of five patients - four in *at least* serious condition and one with non-life threatening injuries. Ages/genders not available at this time. Despite initial reports prior to LAFD arrival, it is not an 'auto into building' nor are there any patients trapped. Queries regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 4864; FS 85; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E285 E36 E79 E85 EM1 EM11 EM13 HR3 RA36 RA38 RA79 RA85 RA864 T85; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Jumper; INC#0955; 04:42PM; 689 S Francisco St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IaYo1I; Downtown; With the LAPD Crisis Response unit was on scene, the patient was safely taken into custody and transport to the hospital for evaluation. Firefighters are recovering all equipment and will be clearing the scene soon. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E10 E11 E211 E226 E26 EM11 RA11 RA17 T11 T26 TV4; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Jumper; INC#0955; 01:57PM; 689 S Francisco St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IaYo1I; Downtown; One person on the ledge over the SB 110 FY. Fire companies deployed the air rescue cushion to support law enforcement operations in trying to safely bring the patient down. Commuters are advised to avoid the intersection and seek the available alternate routes. CHP Log# 1445 LAPD Inc# 2725; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC11 E10 E11 E211 E226 E26 EM11 RA11 RA17 T11 T26 TV4; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0036; 01:19AM; 5474 E Alhambra Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Xv7FHu; El Sereno; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters located and extinguished the fire in 48 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to a large one story, commercial structure. The fire was contained to the building of origin. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 CM20 CM22 E16 E2 E201 E202 E212 E3 E47 EM1 RA12 RA47 T1 T12 T2; CH9; 14 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0036; 01:12AM; 5474 E Alhambra Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Xv7FHu; El Sereno; Two story (residential over commercial) vacant building with heavy smoke showing upon arrival of the first fire company. There are two additional buildings being exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode, working to locate the fire. One additional task force requested. The 9-1-1 call was received at 12:31AM.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E16 E2 E202 E212 E47 RA12 RA47 T12 T2; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Hiker Rescue - Hoist Operation; INC#1179; 04:51PM; 13000 W Sayre St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S1yzWf; Sylmar; Firefighters located a 57yo female hiker with a non-life threatening injury. The patient also has her dog with her. LAFD Air Ops will be conducting a hoist operation for the patient. One of the rescuers is walking the dog part way down to firefighters making their way up to the location on foot. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 4:18PM. No further details.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E239 E298 E75 E91 H2 H3 HA2 HA3 RA75 RH114 T39 T98; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0881; 01:52PM; 22135 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lDcWPH; Canoga Park; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. The initial reports indicate the fire possibly started in some equipment outside and extended into the attic. Crews protected the interior from as much damage as possible while the attic fire was extinguished. No further details. ; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E273 E293 E305 E72 RA73 RA90 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#0881; 01:41PM; 22135 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lDcWPH; Canoga Park; The interior of the home is clear and firefighters are conducting salvage operations to protect property while fire attack and roof operations are working to isolate and extinguish a well developed attic fire. All occupants were reported to have safely exited the structure prior to LAFD arrival. No injuries reported.; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E273 E293 E305 E72 RA73 RA90 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0881; 01:27PM; 22130 W Archwood St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lztMPB; Canoga Park; One story, single family dwelling with smoke showing from the attic. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. One additional task force requested. ; FS 105; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E105 E293 E72 RA73 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart
